title: Tteokbokki (Korean Spicy Rice Cakes)
ingredients: 2  dried anchovies, or more to taste
method: Step 1: Combine water and anchovies in a saucepan and bring to a boil. Cook for 10 minutes. Remove and discard anchovies. Set anchovy water aside.
Step 2: Combine chile paste, sugar, soy sauce, and corn syrup in a bowl. Set chle paste mixture aside.
Step 3: Add rice cakes, onion, and chile paste mixture to anchovy water. Bring to a boil for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add spring onion and boil 3 minutes more.
Step 4: This is quite spicy, so adjust the quantity of chile sauce for less heat.
Step 5: If you use frozen rice cakes, defrost them in the microwave for 30 seconds. Don't boil the rice cakes too long, or they'll get mushy. The texture should be chewy.
